descriptions.availableCommands: List of available commands (not case-sensitive), type:  ```?command```

commands.name: Play [keyword(s)]
commands.value: Searches 10 best matching results, after that type 1-10 to select

commands.name: Join
commands.value: Tell bot to join the voice channel

commands.name: Leave
commands.value: Tell bot to leave the voice channel

commands.name: Help
commands.value: Show all available commands and help
